attributes.additional_details:
In April 2013 DLA will stop for everyone who receives it and the new PIP/universal credit will start.

So many people, including myself will loose most of their income due to this change and we are unable to work more or at all.

DLA is a lifeline for everyone that receives it and most people will be refused the new benefit under the new guidelines.

This is one thing that MPs need to stop thinking about saving money and think about the people of the country for once.

Many, like me, still struggle to buy things like food even though they receive benefits and work part time too.

KEEP DLA. SCRAP PIP
